text: LaVonne Griffin-Valade (born 1952 or 1953) is an American politician and author. She was the Oregon Secretary of State from 2023 to 2025. After Shemia Fagan resigned as secretary of state, Governor Tina Kotek picked Griffin- Valade to the office in June 2023. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Oregon Category:Writers from Oregon Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: LaVonne Griffin-Valade
